headline: Is Applied Materials (AMAT) Well-positioned to Capitalize the AI Trend?
summary: Matrix Asset Advisors, an asset management company, released its Q2 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The stock market rallied +10.94% in Q2 after falling -4.27% in the first quarter of 2025. Moreover, the market was up +6.20% for the year-to-date through June 30. Matrix’s equity portfolios performed well […]

headline: Inflation Data, Retail Sales, Cisco Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: This week brings consumer and wholesale inflation data, which will be eyed with a view to when the Federal Reserve might start cutting interest rates. Earnings are due this week from companies including Deere, network-equipment maker Cisco and Applied Materials.
